# Global Health Disparities Dashboard

## About
Interactive dashboard for analyzing health disparities across 150 countries.

## Features
- Country comparison tool
- Predictive modeling
- Regional analysis
- Data visualization

## Data Sources
World Bank, WHO, UN Development Data
